entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
